title: Strength Training for Beginners: A Complete Guide
description: A step-by-step guide to strength training for beginners, covering exercises, safety tips, and progressive overload techniques.

sections.title: Why Strength Training?
sections.content: Strength training not only builds muscle but also improves bone density, metabolism, and overall health. Itâ€™s an essential part of any balanced fitness routine.

sections.title: Beginner-Friendly Workouts
sections.content: Start with compound movements like squats, push-ups, and deadlifts. Focus on correct form before adding weight. Use progressive overload by gradually increasing resistance over time.
